amendment.description: Amendment expedites the Cedar River project for flood risk management authorized in the Water Resources Development Act of 2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blum amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blum amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Blum.
